resources.string: Rules: There will be figures front of you, two below and one above, the two of them will contain numbers. It must that sum of numbers from two below figures be equal above, you should put missing number for this.
Example: Number 7 is in the above circle, below circle has question mark, another one contains number 4. So in this way there must be number 3 instead of question mark because 3 + 4 = 7
Required amount of the right answers %s
